description: An ingredient type encapsulates the codecs to serialize and deserialize a custom ingredient. Note that the streamCodec() is only used if ICustomIngredient.isSimple() returns false .

fields.name: codec
fields.description: The field for the codec record component.

fields.name: streamCodec
fields.description: The field for the streamCodec record component.

constructors.name: IngredientType
constructors.description: Constructor for ingredient types that use a regular codec for network syncing.

constructors.name: IngredientType
constructors.description: Creates an instance of a IngredientType record class.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of this record class. The representation contains the name of the class, followed by the name and value of each of the record components.

methods.name: hashCode
methods.description: Returns a hash code value for this object. The value is derived from the hash code of each of the record components.

methods.name: equals
methods.description: Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this one. The objects are equal if the other object is of the same class and if all the record components are equal. All components in this record class are compared with Objects::equals(Object,Object) .

methods.name: codec
methods.description: Returns the value of the codec record component.

methods.name: streamCodec
methods.description: Returns the value of the streamCodec record component.
